DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate relative effectiveness safety Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold acute myocardial infarction compare ( drug elute stent ) DES .
DOC.criteria: Age 19 Acute myocardial infarction Intervention Bioresorbable Vascular Scaffold Agreed write informed consent form Bypass graft surgery ( CABG ) recommend Lesion previous bypass graft surgery ( CABG ) Severe calcification and/or severe tortuosity Contraindication antiplatelet agent Inability take dual antiplatelet therapy within 1 year Life expectancy 1year Subjects schedule receive cardiac surgery serious noncardiac surgery Cardiac shock
